attributes.additional_details: To support the community’s of Great Britain and get our country financially stable and a happy peaceful place to reside
attributes.background:
I would like the King to call for a general election.
This country is in desperate despair with the economy, taxes, wages, BSL doesn’t work this also needs addressing

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Call an immediate general election:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641904
